// Like the main part of the app, very interesting import React, {useState} from 'react' const GuestForm = () => { const [guest, setGuest] = useState({ name: '', phone: '', dietary: 'Non-Veg', }) //destructuring const [name, phone, dietary] = guest //an event varable?? const handleChange = e => { //whenever you need to change guest var you need to call the set guest argument setGuest } return (

Invite Someone

Dietary

) } export default GuestForm
